rules_text:
During your turn, spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast and abilities your opponents activate cost {1} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.
{2}{W}{W}: Transform Matt Murdock. Activate only outside of combat.
rules_text2:
As long as it's your turn, Daredevil has first strike.
During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.
